an4.178:1.6: Tassa kho evaṃ → tassa kho etaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | evaṃ kho tassa (?)
an4.178:1.7: lepagatena → lasagatena (bj, pts1) | lapagatena (s1-3), gaṇheyyapi → gaṇheyyāpi (pts1) | gayheyyapi (?), bajjheyyapi → khajjeyyapi (bj) | bajjheyyāpi (pts1)
an4.178:1.11: Tassa kho evaṃ → tassa kho etaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | evaṃ kho tassa (?)
